channel.title: No-ip doesnt work!? wtf!
channel.description:
hello, people
could u please help me out with this. i think i have a problem. but i can't figure out for myself. i port forwarded to 43594.. so that should be fine. now i made a no-ip account. than made no-ip addres. downloaded auto update no-ip duc. i click the box , right next to ur no-ip addres that u have made. than its being shy. but people still couldn't login. now i went to my firewall and unblocked it. quess what!? it still didn't worked. could please anyone be kind enough to help me.

item.title: No-ip doesnt work!? wtf!
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

i have also a question… it asks for this…

DNS Host (A) DNS Host (Round Robin) DNS Alias (CNAME) Port 80 Redirect Web Redirect

wich one to choose?

and what about this :S?

IP Address: .....

what do i need to fill in there? my ip addres? my gateway? default?
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2007, 08:22:03 AM[/size][hr]any help!?

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip doesnt work!? wtf!
item.dc:creator: @0wn4g3_R4ng3 0wn4g3 R4ng3
item.description:
@0wn4g3_R4ng3 wrote:

Junky, I’ve had this problem before. Use what I do, it works most of the time (80% of the time)

Step 1. Delete your No-IP adress
Step 2. Add it again
Step 3. Make a No-IP group named something like MoparScape
Step 4. Add your server IP to the group
Step 5. Try logging into your server

It works for me all the time actually. Lets hope it works for you. And, it might not work for you because I didn’t have to port-forward since I don’t have a router.

Read full topic
